scripts.start: npm run prepare && cp index-dev.html public/index.html && npm run web
scripts.start:webxdc: npm run prepare && cp index-dev.html public/index.html && npm run webxdc
scripts.build: npm run prepare && npm run browserify
scripts.build:webxdc: npm run prepare && npm run browserify:webxdc
scripts.prepare: npm run prepare:config && npm run prepare:public && npm run prepare:style && npm run prepare:wasm
scripts.browserify: ln -sf backend-browser.js storage/backend.js && browserify app.js | indexhtmlify --title 'peermaps' > public/index.html
scripts.browserify:webxdc: ln -sf backend-webxdc.js storage/backend.js && browserify -p [ tinyify --ecmaVersion 10 ] app.js | indexhtmlify --title 'peermaps (webxdc)' > public/index.html && zip -r peermaps.xdc public/ && echo '>> public/ folder disk size' && du -sh public && echo '>> peermaps.xdc size' && wc -c peermaps.xdc
scripts.test:browserify:webxdc: ln -sf backend-webxdc.js storage/backend.js && browserify -p [ tinyify --ecmaVersion 10 ] app.js > /dev/null
scripts.web: ln -sf backend-browser.js storage/backend.js && npm run budo
scripts.webxdc: ln -sf backend-webxdc.js storage/backend.js && concurrently "npm:budo" "webxdc-dev run http://localhost:9966"
